function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Possible faecal-oral transmission of SARS-CoV-2","Impact":"Increased risk of widespread transmission through contaminated water and food sources","Mitigation":"Improve sanitation practices, educate the public about hygiene, and implement water treatment processes","Technologies":"Water treatment systems, sewage monitoring technologies, analytical genomic approaches","People":"General population, especially those with limited access to clean water and sanitation facilities","Owner":"Public health authorities, government agencies, sanitation and water management organizations"},{"Description":"Unpublished data on infectious SARS-CoV-2 in faecal samples","Impact":"Lack of conclusive evidence and potential misinformation","Mitigation":"Peer review and publication of comprehensive research data","Technologies":"Peer review processes, scientific publication platforms","People":"Researchers, scientific community","Owner":"Research institutions, scientific journals, academic organizations"},{"Description":"Use of wastewater 'analysis' for monitoring COVID-19 incidence","Impact":"Potential privacy concerns and data misuse","Mitigation":"Implement strict data protection measures, obtain informed consent, and anonymize data","Technologies":"Data encryption, anonymization techniques, consent management systems","People":"General population, individuals contributing to wastewater samples","Owner":"Data protection authorities, public health authorities, wastewater monitoring organizations"}]}
